title: What if I dreamed that I was swimming in the sea, according to Ibn Sirin? And I dreamed that I was swimming in a raging sea and I dreamed that I was swimming in a sea of ​​fish

preview.html: I dreamed that I was swimming in the sea. The sea reflects many conflicting feelings for different people, even according to the psychological state of the person. Some see that the sea inspires comfort and reassurance, and some see it, and their bodies tremble and they feel fear and awe, and the sea is loved by some and feared by others, so what if the dreamer sees himself swimming in the sea in his dream? Is he reassured or disturbing? This is what we will talk about in this article. I dreamed that I was swimming in the sea according to Ibn Sirin. What is the interpretation of the vision in which I dreamed of swimming in the sea? The sea in a dream has many interpretations that depend on many factors, including the state of the sea itself, calm or turbulent. A calm sea symbolizes emotional balance, while a turbulent sea symbolizes the turmoil of feelings and things out of control. Unclean water predicts troubles in the future, and if the dreamer swims in a sea of ​​​​garbage, this symbolizes the stress that he will soon suffer from. Easy swimming predicts that the visionary will achieve what he aspires to, but if he swims with difficulty, this indicates that he is going through some difficulties in the current period. If he is swimming on his back, this leads the perpetrator of the vision to commit sins and transgressions. I dreamed that I was swimming in the sea according to Ibn Sirin If the dreamer sees himself swimming in the sea quickly, smoothly and skillfully, this indicates success and obtaining what he wants. If swimming in the sea is associated with the acquisition of pearls, this symbolizes the money and knowledge that the visionary will acquire. Also, washing with sea water leads to Atonement for sins and purification from disobedience, and if the dreamer sees himself walking on sea water, this indicates righteousness and piety. However, if the dreamer sees himself swimming in the sea in winter, this indicates an illness that he will soon suffer from, and if he drowns in the vision, this indicates death. To reach the most accurate interpretation of your dream, search on Google on the Egyptian dream interpretation website, which includes thousands of interpretations by the most important jurists of interpretation. I dreamed that I was swimming in the sea for single women Swimming in the sea symbolizes the psychological and emotional state of an unmarried woman. If swimming is done easily and skillfully, this indicates her stability and psychological and emotional balance. The sea in a girl's dream symbolizes the partner or lover she aspires to communicate with. If the sea is clear, this indicates the purity and chastity of this partner and that their relationship will be healthy and honest. If the sea is not clear, this indicates her association with a person she loves, who deceives her and exploits her, and this relationship will be unhealthy, and the vision is a warning to leave this relationship. Drowning in the sea for the dreamer means that he will feel lost due to entering into a love relationship with an inappropriate person. I dreamed that I was swimming in the sea for a married woman. Seeing swimming in a married woman’s dream indicates the kindness and happiness that she finds with her husband. If he suffers from the waves and swims with difficulty, this leads to a turbulent and unhappy married life, and it also symbolizes many disagreements and problems. The sea itself indicates the husband, so if the

title: Interpretation of a dream about picking olives from the ground in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream of picking olives from the ground in a dream. Place officials do not do the interpretations, but rather they come from the heart. Interpretations of some scholars. Interpretation of a dream of picking olives from the ground in a dream. Picking olives from trees in a dream can indicate recovery from illness and the end of the pain that the dreamer was feeling in the dream. That time. Whoever sees in his dream that he is picking olives could indicate good changes that will occur in his life during those days. Seeing someone picking olives in a dream may indicate a lot of money and abundant goodness that the dreamer will receive during this time. And if one sees That he is picking olive fruits, this may indicate the money that the dreamer may earn in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about collecting dirhams from the ground in a dream. Anyone who sees in a dream that he is collecting dirhams from the ground can indicate many good things that will come to the dreamer during this. Time. A dream about collecting dirhams from the ground in a dream may indicate positive changes that will happen to its owner in those days. Whoever sees in a dream that he is collecting dirhams may indicate happy events that will come to the dreamer during that period. Seeing collecting dirhams in a dream may indicate upcoming joys for the dreamer in Those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about collecting golden pounds in a dream. Collecting golden pounds in a dream may indicate the marriage of an unmarried young man or an unmarried girl. A dream about collecting golden pounds may indicate the enormous level of livelihood that the dreamer will gain during this time. In the event that one sees That he was collecting golden pounds in a dream, this may indicate peace of mind and relief from the stress and tension that the dreamer is suffering from in those days. If you see yourself collecting golden pounds in a dream, this may indicate achieving goals and ambitions during these days, and God knows best. If you see yourself picking up a hailstone in a dream, this may mean that the dreamer will face some worries in his life during those days, and God knows best. If one saw that he was collecting beads in a dream, this may indicate his marriage to a good woman in those days. If one saw collecting rosary beads in a dream, this may indicate the peace and stability that the dreamer was enjoying in his life at that time. That time. It is possible that seeing someone collecting rosary beads in a dream may indicate happy events coming for the dreamer in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about collecting grains of rice in a dream Seeing someone picking grains of rice in a dream may indicate the large amount of money that the dreamer obtains in a dream. Evidence of goodness and happiness. What is the interpretation of seeing a girl in a dream that she has lost her hijab? It indicates the weakness of this girl’s faith. Interpretation of seeing buying a hijab in a married woman’s dream? Elements of a new life full of goodness and faith. Interpretation of seeing a veiled man in a dream? An argument for the resurrection of some good deeds. Interpretation of a veiled girl by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream of a veiled girl in a dream has many connotations mentioned by Ibn Sirin, as it indicates nourishment, righteousness, and the coming life filled with many positives. If he sees Someone in a dream sees a beautiful girl in a veil pointing to the house. This indicates the joy and happiness that the dreamer will be in. Seeing a veiled and modest girl in a dream indicates kindness and happiness that prevail over the dreamer. Seeing a veiled girl means a jacket and getting rid of fear and anxiety. The girl appears in a beautiful way. General in a dream: joy and good circumstances in which the dreamer will find himself. Seeing a dream of a veiled girl for a single woman. If a girl sees in a dream that she has lost her hijab, this indicates the weakness of that girl’s faith. If you see a veiled girl in a girl’s dream, this may indicate an imminent marriage. The veil can In general, for a girl, it indicates a positive change that the girl will have. Buying a hijab in a girl’s dream indicates a close relationship with a good and virtuous person. Interpretation of a dream about a veiled girl for a married woman: A veiled girl in a married woman’s dream is evidence of her satisfaction with the life she lives. If a woman sees For a married woman in a dream that she is wearing a hijab, then this vision is considered pregnant. Buying a hijab in a dream for a married woman is evidence of a new life full of goodness and faith. Taking off the hijab in a dream is evidence of disagreements and tension. Seeing a dream of a veiled girl for a pregnant woman. Seeing a veiled girl in a dream is pregnant, or If she sees that she is veiled, then this vision is good news for the safety of the fetus and an easy birth without problems. The veil in general in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of the approaching date of birth. Seeing her removing the veil in a pregnant woman’s dream may indicate that there are some disputes with the husband. Interpretation of a girl’s dream If a man sees a veiled girl in a dream, this is evidence that he will perform some good deeds. Seeing a veiled girl in a dream is evidence of his marriage to a girl he did not know before. Interpretation of a dream about a veiled girl by Al-Nabulsi: If a person sees in a dream a girl covered with a black veil, this indicates that he A person who is wise in his actions. A white veil in a dream indicates an abundance of food, especially if it has a golden color. Joy in a dream. Seeing grilled fish. Shrimps in a dream. Lentils in a dream. Seeing raw fish. title: What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about drowning in the sea for good and evil?

preview.html: Today, through this article, we learn about the interpretation of a dream about drowning in the sea, as it is one of the dreams that many people see in their dreams, and we will discover what dream interpretation scholars say about this topic. Follow usInterpretation of the dream of drowning in the sea by Ibn Sirin Imam Ibn Sirin says that seeing drowning in a dream varies according to the meanings it denotes depending on the condition of the dreamer, as well as according to the details he saw in the dream, as follows: Whoever dreams that he is drowning in the sea and dies by drowning, then this dream is one of the dreams. Bad, as it appears that the dreamer lives a life full of sins and abominations and does not. Work as an account for his afterlife, and this dream is a message from God Almighty to him about the necessity of stopping committing these sins and repenting to God Almighty before the end of his term and living with those who are immortal in Hell. A sick person dreams that he is drowning, then this dream means that he will not be cured of his illness that he is suffering from at the time he sees this. The dream, and that he will die because of it, and God knows best. But if the dreamer is in good health and does not suffer from illness or disease, and he sees in a dream that he will drown in the dream but he does not drown, then this dream means that the dreamer needs a ruler. Or a person of high rank, and that God Almighty will help him meet this need. It is an auspicious dream for a person to see in a dream that he will drown, but he was able to resist the water and survive on his own. Whoever dreams that he is in a clear sea and its waters are so clear that he can see the bottom of the sea without obstruction, then this dream is one of the good dreams that indicates that God Almighty will grant the dreamer abundant goodness. And the blessed diet. Drowning in a dream is a symbol. One of the bad dreams is that someone sees that he is in the clear sea, but he dies from drowning, and this dream symbolizes that the dreamer has people in his life who show him love and cover him with hatred and hostility. He wants to harm him, and this dream serves as a warning to the pioneer that he must be careful of the people around him and keep away the people he does not trust in his life so as not to harm them. A non-Muslim who sees in a dream that he is drowning in the sea, this dream is one of the most promising dreams because it indicates That God Almighty will bless him with Islam, improve his work, join the true religion, and gain the satisfaction of God Almighty. Whoever sees in a dream that he is drowning in the sea, and the weather is very cold, and the dreamer in the dream feels fear and shivering due to the severity of the cold, then this dream means that the dreamer’s time has come. And God knows best. One of the bad dreams is that a person sees in a dream that he is diving into sea water, and the weather is very cold, and the dreamer feels very cold and does not know how to get rid of it. Whoever sees this vision, we advise him to pray to God Almighty to relieve him of his distress and not to despair until God helps him get rid of his anxiety. Interpretation of a dream about drowning in the sea and remaining for single people. The interpretation of drowning in an unmarried girl’s dream varies depending on the details she saw in the dream, as follows: A married woman who dreams that she is drowning in the sea, and the sea is rough and the waves are crashing, this dream means that this girl will face a problem like...

title: Interpretation of a dream about a dead person cleaning the floor in a dream according to interpretation scholars

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams of a dead person cleaning the floor in a dream According to interpretation scholars, a dead person cleaning the floor in a dream is among the dreams that some people have, which carry a group of different meanings, and these interpretations vary depending on the situation. From the scenes, when someone misses a loved one, he always feels homesick for him, and seeing that in a dream, cleaning the floor in a dream for the dead shows interpretations indicating that a crisis will happen to him. The seer, and therefore, the interpretation of a dream of a dead person cleaning the floor in a dream will be determined by interpretation scholars.Interpretation of a dream of a dead person cleaning the floor in a dreamSeeing a corpse in a dream indicates many things. Longing for the deceased makes us see him often in our dreams. Among the dreams that a person dreams of is seeing the dead person cleaning the floor in a dream that carries several different interpretations and signals, which were concluded as follows: Seeing the dead person cleaning the floor in a dream means that the dreamer will face many crises in the coming period. The interpretation of seeing the dead mother cleaning the floor indicates To the presence of many disagreements between her children. One of the indications of cleaning the floor for the deceased in a dream is that the dreamer is committing many sins. It could be a sign of a major health crisis. Seeing yourself cleaning the floor for the deceased in a dream indicates that the dreamer is neglecting the justice of his personal life. Cleaning the house for the dead is evidence On the good news of the arrival of goodness and blessings and the improvement of their conditions. Interpretation of the dead man cleansing the earth for single people Among the evidence for the interpretation of seeing a dead man cleansing the earth for individuals, for which many different interpretations have appeared, the most important of which came in the interpretation of seeing a dead man cleansing the earth for free people, and in his interpretation it is a type From fear of the future, including: Seeing a dead, unmarried person being cleaned in a dream means that the person falls into sins and disobedience. A dead person in a dream for a single girl indicates despair and fear of the future. A dead person crying in a dream for an unmarried woman shows his need for begging and charity. Seeing unmarried grandparents in a dream indicates wealth and goodness for her in her life. Seeing a dead person in a person’s dream indicates his laziness and inability to carry out any activity in his life. Interpretation of a dead man clearing the ground in a dream for a married woman. A married woman sees a dead person in her dream, and from her visions about him She sees the dead person cleaning the floor in a dream, which carries many interpretations explained by commentators and scholars, which are as follows: A married woman seeing the deceased cleaning the floor in a dream indicates that she will fall into distress and a financial crisis in the coming period. Cleaning the floor indicates A dead woman in a dream for a married woman indicates that there are disagreements between her and the whereabouts of her husband. A dead person in a married woman’s dream indicates a new life full of happiness and pleasure. Kissing a dead wife in a dream indicates an abundance of sustenance and blessings. The return of a dead person to life in a married woman’s dream is evidence of good health. Good for her. Interpretation of dead paves the way for the divorced woman. title: What is the interpretation of a dream about a snake according to Ibn Sirin and major interpreters?

preview.html: What is the interpretation of a dream about a snake? A dream about a snake is one of the things that creates confusion and questions in the dreamer’s mind in an unusual way and makes him very keen to know it. In the following article we will learn about the most important interpretations related to this topic, so let’s read the following. What is the interpretation of a dream about a snake? A dreamer who sees a snake in a dream without being afraid of it shows that he has a very strong personality that makes him able to face all the crises that he faces. If one sees a snake in his dream, this indicates the presence of an enemy very close to him, and he does not realize his presence and must beware of his evil. If the dreamer sees the snake in his dream and it grows, this means that he received a big promotion in his workplace in appreciation for the great efforts he made to develop it. The dreamer’s vision in a dream about the snake and killing it symbolizes his ability to get rid of his enemies who surrounded him from all sides and his safety from their evils. What Is the interpretation of a dream about a snake by Ibn Sirin? Ibn Sirin interprets a dreamer who sees a snake in a dream as indicating that there are many haters who do not like goodness at all. If one sees a snake in his dream, this means that he feels very anxious about something new that he will do in the future. His life and he is very afraid that the results will not be in his favor. If the dreamer sees a snake in his dream, this indicates the presence of a close friend of his who agrees with him a lot in dealings and shows him friendliness even though he holds a deep grudge against him. Seeing the dreamer in a dream with a snake circling around him symbolizes... He will get into a big problem that he will not be able to get rid of easily and he will need support from people close to him. What is the interpretation of a dream about a snake for a single woman? Seeing one person in a dream with a snake means that there are many bad events happening in her life at that time that disturbed her. Her life a lot. If the dreamer sees a snake during her sleep, this indicates the presence of a girl who speaks badly about her behind her back to distort her image in front of others. What is the interpretation of seeing many snakes in a dream for a single woman? If an unmarried woman sees a lot of snakes in her dream, This means that there are many people around her who do not love her at all and are always seeking to harm her. If the dreamer sees many snakes in her bed, this indicates that her relationship with her family is very disturbed due to the many disputes that occur between them. Interpretation of dreams of a snake chasing me for a single woman: A dream of a single woman chasing her A snake is evidence of a young man with malicious intentions who is trying to get close to her by deceiving her with sweet words and she should not fall into his net. In case the dreamer sees a snake chasing her in his dream, this means that she will receive a very big shock to those close to her and enter a state of great sadness because of her trust in others. Its place. What is the interpretation of a dream about a snake for a married woman? If a married woman sees a snake in her dream, this indicates that she is suffering during this period from many fears resulting from the force of many disagreements with her husband. If the dreamer sees a snake in her dream, this expresses many burdens. Alt

title: Interpretation of the length of the month in a dream

preview.html: We present to you, dear reader, the interpretation of the duration of the month in a dream by scholars and commentators through our article today from the Encyclopedia. Evidence of what he saw in the dream and whether it carries with it a sign, good or bad, and the interpretation certainly varies depending on the type of dream. The person is single, married, single, married or pregnant. Seeing the month in a dream has many different meanings. It is one of the common things that a person sees all the time, to know the number of days, what the current month is, etc., so we will show you differently. The opinions of jurists and translators in the lines below, just follow us. Interpretation of the length of the month in a dream. There are those who dream of visions with dates in which the day, month, and year are mentioned, and among them are those who expect a certain thing to happen on that date on earth, so what do scholars and jurists think about these dreams? This is what we will show you. There are different interpretations of seeing the months in a dream, suggested by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi, and they are as follows: Interpretation of seeing the month of Muharram in a dream If the dreamer sees the month of Muharram in a dream, this vision carries with it many positive signs, including: It is considered good news because it means that the fortuneteller He will be cured of any disease and released from prison if he is imprisoned. It also indicates relief for a person and his salvation from enemies. The dreamer will attain a high status and status if he desires it, and if he is poor, then God Almighty will make him rich. The meaning of this dream is that the dreamer is witnessing distress on earth. Great, such as the appearance of a scholar or the death of an imam characterized by justice and piety. If the dreamer travels and withdraws from his people, this vision means that he will return to his people again. If the dreamer is traveling and is afraid of drowning and winds, then this dream means that the people with him will be saved from all Hated. God Almighty’s repentance is announced to the dreamer if he disobeys him and commits sins. This dream indicates the dreamer’s return from sins, misguidance, and heresy. If the dreamer desires a good son, this dream means that God will give him a son in reality. The dreamer will return to his place if he turns away from him. Perhaps this vision is a sign that Muslims will receive a great reward and spoils. Interpretation of seeing the month of Safar in a dream. If the dreamer sees a month of travel in a dream, this is an indication of certain indicators. This month does not bring with it much good, but it also does not bring much harm to people who They were exposed to distress or distress. If the dreamer is sick, then this vision is evidence that he enjoys health and recovery. Of diseases. Interpretation of seeing Rabi’ al-Awwal in a dream: Perhaps this vision indicates the birth of a righteous son and the end of all hardship and temptation. If the dreamer is a merchant, this means that he feels happiness and joy, and his trade will bring profit and blessing will increase. This dream may indicate the victory of the oppressed and the death of distress or tribulation. Which the dreamer suffered from. Interpretation of a dream in the month of Rabi’ al-Akhir: If the dream is in the month of Rabi’ al-Akhir, this means that the dreamer will give birth to a son and he will be a hero or a scholar, and it indicates his victory over enemies. If the vision indicates evil: it means the speed and acceleration of its appearance, and

title: Interpretation of seeing green parsley in a dream in detail

preview.html: Follow with us the interpretation of seeing parsley in a dream through your favorite website, Dream Interpretation, which is concerned with providing everything you are looking for to interpret your vision. Interpretation of a dream about parsley for single women. Interpretation of a dream about parsley for single women indicates the abundance of good and upcoming sustenance and a lot of praise for upcoming good deeds. To dream With leafy vegetables such as parsley and others, in all cases, it means improving conditions and a life full of fun and joy. If the unmarried girl is suffering from an illness, it is a sign of her recovery and a strong will. When you see parsley when you buy it, it means that you will get money and great attention. Interpretation of a dream about parsley for a woman Married women: In general, dreaming of any of the natural elements that are very beneficial to a waking person falls under the positive interpretation of mental and physical health, especially parsley because of the meanings of pleasure and joy it brings to the dream. A married woman. But if you see her drinking parsley water or preparing it, this is an excellent indicator of the speed of recovery from the diseases that afflict them, even chronic mental illnesses such as depression. In the event that she sees that she is constantly cutting parsley leaves, this is in psychology, which indicates the presence of positive latent energy that requires Constant thinking in the subconscious mind, which with this behavior wants to empty what is inside it. Interpretation of a dream about parsley for a pregnant woman: In the event that a pregnant woman sees parsley, it is evidence of the physical health of herself and the fetus, and this is confirmed by the scholars of Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, as it indicates a positive synchronization for a stable psychological and marital life. Interpretation of parsley in the case of Its cultivation or presence in abundant quantities inside the home is evidence of the goodness of the home. Interpretation of a dream about parsley by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets a dream about parsley as convincing evidence of the ability to succeed and excel in all areas of life and overcome difficulties in the appropriate way, but after going through many psychological obstacles and continuous efforts to overcome He explained that it is a state of psychological and familial calm experienced in marital and family life, and works to bring relationships closer together, which helps spread an atmosphere of lasting happiness, and God knows best. He explained the case of people who consume fresh parsley as evidence that they will enjoy a long life in full health and well-being, which makes it He goes beyond the stages of family solidarity that he relies on. He returned to some interpretations of a dream about parsley that it shows the reality of a person who can be relied upon in religious matters and works hard to preserve the religious heritage. If you have a vision that you would like to explain, do not hesitate to put your comment in the comments box below the article, as We invite you to follow our pages on social media.

title: The most important interpretation of Ibn Sirin 11+ for the letter ba

preview.html: Interpretation of the letter B by Ibn Sirin: There are many interpretations of the great scholar Ibn Sirin for dreams that begin with the letter B, and below we will tell you a group of interpretations of these dreams. Interpretation of a dream about a door: If the dream is of open doors, it means an upcoming livelihood, and the doors of houses mean women, and new doors are a metaphor for the Virgin Woman. If the doors are closed, it means the Virgin. Interpretation of seeing eggplant with meat: Dreaming of eggplant means a lot of money and a lot of food, God willing, and if the dream was at the time of planting and harvesting it, it indicates easy livelihood, but if it was at a different time, it means more effort and hardship. To acquire food and they will hate.Interpretation of a dream about a shipSeafood, in a dream, means sustenance, not just money. Whoever is in a boat or ship at sea will marry a woman from the position of that ship, or win something over an enemy of his. The meaning of seeing a basin in a dream: A basin is an unacceptable thing in a dream. It denotes a foolish woman or a foolish maid, and it is said that a dream about a sewer or an unknown place means an adulterous woman. Interpretation of a dream about the sea: It shows a strong king who has power that the people need his justice, and it also shows those who were merchants for his needs and comforts, but whoever enters the sea will enter power and kingship. And whoever sees it from afar. It will grant him a wish. The meaning of seeing incense in a dream. A dream about it is a sign of a good, wise, and reputable man. Whoever smells the scent of frankincense in his dream will hear praise and praise for him, and whoever sees incense planted or leaving his house, he will have a male child. Interpretation of a dream about lightning means guidance after he strays from the path. And it can mean looking at something dazzling, or perhaps if the dreamer is sick, he will recover from his illness. Interpretation of hail in a dream: If the dreamer sees it descending from the sky, this means the Lord’s injustice to the people and taking away their wealth and money, and if this hail is in any season other than winter, this means Short illness and quick recovery. Dreaming of seeing a parrot: Seeing it is a metaphor for a mistake that speaks volumes. It was said that he is a philosopher and a sage, and it was also said that he refers to a beautiful woman with a tactful speech, and it may refer to a very unjust man. Interpretation of the tower in a dream: If the dreamer dreams that he is in a tall tower and is sick, then he will die, and if he sees himself inside a frightening or useless tower, then this is evidence of the grave. Interpretation of leprosy in a dream: Whoever sees himself suffering from leprosy will receive clothing or livelihood. Because leprosy is a metaphor for nourishment. The meaning of a dream about plums: If it is in a dream at its proper time, then it is good and food, but if it is not at the right time, then fatigue, weakness, and extreme difficulty appear. As for seeing the plum itself, it means a metaphor for a good person who provides benefits to all people. Whoever has a vision and wants to explain it, we take Your comments at the bottom of the article on the Shamloul website.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a stranger throwing stones at me

preview.html: A strange interpretation throws stones at me. If a free girl sees in her dream someone she does not know throw stones at her, this is a sign that there are people conspiring against her enemies, planning against her and wanting to harm her. What if the girl sees herself trying to get away from him and she manages to get away from him before he hits her with the stones. This is an indication of... That he will be able to track down these people in reality and escape from their evil. What if an unmarried girl sees in her dream that strangers are trying to throw stones at her? She continues on her way without disturbance. This is an indication that there are those around her who are saying wrong and insulting things to her, but she does not pay attention to them, and this causes They have depression and hatred for her. But if she sees in her dream someone she knows and has a strong love for. But in reality, a dispute arose between them and he was trying to throw stones at her in the dream. This is a sign that this person is deceiving her and will try to harm her. Interpretation of dreams of a small child throwing stones at meIf one sees a child A young boy in a dream, he will throw stones at him. This is an indication that this person is lying about the people close to him. And that he is lying to them about some vital and vital matters in their lives. What if he saw a free girl? In her dream, a young boy was throwing stones at her. This is a strong indication that this girl The wise woman had greatly wronged someone in her life, and he still carries his guilt on his heels. And if someone sees a child trying to throw a large, heavy stone in a dream, this is a sign that the dreamer is suffering from a big problem and cannot solve it. But if the stone that the child is carrying in The dream is light and easy to carry, then this is a sign that the dreamer will get rid of the great injustice he was exposed to in his life. But if the stone that the child threw in the dream was a white stone, then this is a good vision that indicates great livelihood and abundant money on his way to insight. Interpretation of a dream about stones in A dream for a married woman: Seeing more throwing stones. In a dream for a married woman, there are unpleasant visions that foretell many problems that the dreamer will face in her life. If a married woman sees stones in her house in her dream. This is an indication of many problems and multiple family differences between her and her husband. What if the owner sees The vision that she is facing stones and that she is suffering from them in her dream is an indication of the extent of the suffering that this woman is experiencing. But there is a good aspect to interpreting this vision for a married woman. It is that if the stones that she sees in the dream are white, then it is a sign of great goodness, great nourishment, and comfort after fatigue and hardship. Interpretation of seeing a man throwing stones in a dream: If a man sees someone in his dream, he is throwing stones at him. This is an indication of many problems and difficulties that the dreamer faces in his married life. This vision also shows his bad psychological state. If a man sees in a dream that people are throwing stones at his back, then this A sign that there are people behind his back. What if a single man sees in his dream that he built a stone house? This is a sign of his imminent marriage to a good girl with good morals and religion. He will be blessed with good offspring, God willing. Point of view: Broken stones
